alert.note: Alert for East Otter Tail; West Otter Tail (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 4:11AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Otter Tail County through 445 AM CDT... At 410 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Erhard, or 14 miles north of Fergus Falls, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Maplewood State Park around 415 AM CDT. Edwards around 420 AM CDT. Elizabeth and Carlisle around 425 AM CDT. Fergus Falls around 435 AM CDT. Underwood around 445 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Fergus Falls Airport. This includes Interstate 94 in Minnesota between mile markers 39 and 61. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: East Otter Tail; West Otter Tail
